title: OverEZ Chicken Coop Heater - Heat Lamp – Indoor and Outdoor Coop Heater - Chicken Raising Supplies and Poultry Accessories – Electrical Heat Package
features: IDEAL TEMPERATURE RANGE. The OverEZ chicken coop heater’s ideal temperature range is safe and suitable for all chicken breeds. The simple setup only takes the time to plug-in and turn on, and makes keeping your flock comfortable EZ. Keeping your chickens cozy in their feathers can help regulate blood circulation, improve metabolism, boost mood, and aid breeding.

ENERGY-EFFICIENT. With a 1-switch system, the power is on a direct line for easy control of the energy efficient hardware. Your heat lamp can be used as a dual source of heat and light for your chicken coop.

EZ ON/OFF SWITCH. The OverEZ chicken coop stands by the simplicity in operating our products. With one EZ switch to turn your heater on and off, you can place it conveniently to easily manage your flock’s heat lamp schedule

EASY INSTALLATION. There is no easier installation than just plugging it in to use right away. There is no complicated programming involved with the OverEZ chicken heater. Just connect the chicken warmer to power and fasten on walls or ceilings to customize the location of your heat source.

PACKAGE CONTENTS. This OverEZ chicken coop electrical/heat package includes: One chicken house heater lamp, one electrical/outlet/light switch combo, additional AC duplex electrical outlet, one 50-foot indoor/outdoor extension cord.
